faq.title: FAQ
faq.lead: Frequently asked questions about Penyes and our Penya in Graz.

q1.title: What is a Penya? (FC Barcelona Penya)
q1.text: A Penya is an official FC Barcelona supporters‚Äô club ‚Äî an organized group of fans who share their passion for the club. Penyes exist worldwide and provide a way to watch matches together, organize events, and live the club‚Äôs values ‚Äî especially the connection to Catalan culture and the motto ‚ÄúM√©s que un club‚Äù.

q2.title: When and why does it make sense to join a Penya?
q2.text: Joining a Penya makes sense if you want to share your enthusiasm for FC Barcelona with like-minded people and be part of a strong community. In a Penya you don‚Äôt experience matches alone, but in a lively atmosphere with other fans. You can join events, build friendships, and experience the passion for the club in a new way. You also support Bar√ßa‚Äôs values and traditions.

q3.title: What are the benefits of being a Penya member?
q3.li1: Watching matches together with a real fan atmosphere
q3.li2: Access to fan events, trips and special activities
q3.li3: Discounts on merchandise and tickets (depending on availability/promotions)
q3.li4: A way to support the club and live its culture and traditions
q3.li5: Connect with fans worldwide and make new friends
q3.li6: Official recognition as part of the Bar√ßa family

join.title: Join
join.lead: Here is a simple step-by-step guide on how to become a member of our Penya.

step2.title: Fill in the form
step2.text: Fill out the membership form completely. Pay special attention to fields that must be signed at the end.

step3.title: Sign
step3.text: Please sign all required places. Without a signature we cannot process the application.

step4.title: Pay the membership fee
step4.text: Please pay the fee for your chosen membership and keep the transfer confirmation ready.

step5.title: Send by email
step5.text: Email us the completed membership form and the transfer confirmation as PDFs. We‚Äôll contact you personally with the next steps.

contact.title: Membership contact
contact.subtitle: For questions or to send your documents, feel free to contact us by email.

about.title: About us

about.storySubtitle: Official FC Barcelona Penya in Graz
about.p1: We are an official FC Barcelona Penya, founded in 2025 in Graz‚ÄìSeiersberg. Our community brings together people from all across Styria who share one passion: FC Barcelona.
about.p2: Our mission is to bring the club‚Äôs values and passion to life here in our region. Whether we watch matches together, discuss tactics, or celebrate big victories ‚Äî we always stand united behind Bar√ßa.
about.p3: Everyone is warmly welcome. We‚Äôre looking forward to many unforgettable blaugrana moments!
